price: په حقه يې پر تا داسې كتاب نازل كړى چې د مخكنيو تصديقونكى دى، او تورات او انجيل يې هم نازل كړي.
arabic: نَزَّلَ عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ مُصَدِّقٗا لِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ وَأَنزَلَ ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةَ وَٱلۡإِنجِيلَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: nazzala ʿalayka al-kitāba bil-ḥaqi muṣaddiqan limā bayna yadayhi wa-anzala al-tawrāta wal-injīla
